Introduction

Melody Pink (Korean: 멜로디핑크) was a four-member girl group under KD Entertainment. They initially debuted on September 25, 2019 with the digital single "Hey U" as The Singing Girls (Korean: 노래하는 말괄량이). Melody Pink briefly disbanded on October 12, 2020 as a group due to financial issues within the company caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, however the group was revived in early 2022 with new members and are expecting to make a comeback in 2023. Unfortunately, by September 2022, Melody Pink's planned comeback never materialized leaving their status unknown. On July 26, Seoyoung left the group and the group has officially disbanded.
